InvoiceLineRelationship.name: InvoiceLineRelationship
InvoiceLineRelationship.description: Represents a relationship between invoice line items to support bundles where one parent invoice line has multiple child invoice lines.

AssociatedInvoiceLineId.description: Required. The ID of the related invoice line record. In a bundle relationship, this invoice line is the child.

AssociatedInvoiceLinePricing.description: Required. This field describes how the related invoice line is priced relative to the primary invoice line.

AssociatedInvoiceLineRole.description: Required. This field describes the role of the related invoice line in the relationship. The value is derived from the AssociatedProductRoleCat field of the ProductRelationshipType object.

InvoiceId.description: The ID of the related invoice record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed an invoice line relationship record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed an invoice line relationship record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that the user only accessed the invoice line relationship record or a related list view (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed the invoice line relationship record itself.

MainInvoiceLineId.description: Required. The ID of the primary invoice line record. In a bundle relationship, this invoice line is the parent.

MainInvoiceLineRole.description: Required. This field describes the role of the primary invoice line in the relationship. The value is derived from the MainProductRoleCat field of the ProductRelationshipType object.

Name.description: Required. An auto-generated number identifying the invoice line relationship.

ProductRelationshipTypeId.description: The ID of the product relationship type record between the main and associated invoice lines.
